files.patch:
@@ -51,1 +51,5 @@
-            reply.println("Only OpenJDK [Committers](https://openjdk.org/bylaws#committer) can use the `/clean` command");
+            reply.println("To use the `/clean` command, you need to be a [Committer](https://openjdk.org/bylaws#committer) "
+                    + "in the OpenJDK [census](https://openjdk.org/census)"
+                    + " and your GitHub account needs to be linked with your OpenJDK username"
+                    + "([how to associate your GitHub account with your OpenJDK username]"
+                    + "(https://wiki.openjdk.org/display/skara#Skara-AssociatingyourGitHubaccountandyourOpenJDKusername)).");
